product_name: Tifosi Podium XC Interchangeable Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Tifosi Podium XC sunglasses are designed for clear vision during muscle-powered adventures from dawn runs to cycling in the glaring sun, and they include interchangeable lenses for any light level.
short_description: Tifosi Podium XC sunglasses are designed for clear vision during muscle-powered adventures from dawn runs to cycling in the glaring sun, and they include interchangeable lenses for any light level.
